name: Sailfinder
tagline: Unofficial Tinder client for Sailfish OS
body:
### Sailfinder
Sailfinder is an unofficial Tinder client for Sailfish OS.
Sailfinder is released under GPLv3, the source can be found in our Github repository where you can also report bugs.

#### Features
* Like, dislike and superlike people
* View their pictures and bio without looking at their profile
* Change your Tinder discovery, location and other settings
* View your profile: pictures, about, ...
* Update your bio and gender
* Countdown when you're out of likes
* View your matches
* Report & unmatch matches
* Send messages
* Save people or matches to your phone
* Autoliker

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Sailfinder? Please let me know by opening an 'Issue' on Github.

### Other
I'm not responsible for burning your house down, get fired or anything else when you use my app!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
